1216180.name: Vestaria Saga I Soundtrack PIANO ARRANGEMENT & 8-BIT MUSIC VERSION
1216180.description:
For Vestaria Saga music fans! This exclusive music album features seven piano arrangements, seventeen 8-bit versions and seven original tracks from Vestaria Saga I by composer Hiroto Saitoh, for a total of 31 tracks!

The 8-bit versions, previously only available on CD, include six *new* tracks and are released digitally for the very first time! The piano arrangements are completely brand-new and exclusive to this special album. Includes seven of the corresponding original tracks. All tracks are in .mp3 format.

Vestaria Saga I Soundtrack PIANO ARRANGEMENT & 8-BIT MUSIC VERSION

-- PIANO ARRANGEMENT --

01 Chronicle
02 Nobility
03 Fellow Soldier
04 Legend of the Circlet
05 Ambition and Avarice
06 Legendary Ballad-Heroic Verses
07 Starmaiden

-- 8-BIT MUSIC VERSION --

08 Intertwining Hearts
09 Leviathan
10 Approaching Enemies
11 The Gale
12 Forward March
13 Encounter
14 Chronicle
15 Ambition and Avarice
16 Behind the Tears
17 A Promise Between Brothers
18 Tender Days
19 Nobility
20 Fellow Soldier
21 Legend of the Circlet
22 Legendary Ballad
23 Heroic Verses
24 Starmaiden

-- ORIGINAL --

25 Chronicle
26 Nobility
27 Fellow Soldier
28 Legend of the Circlet
29 Ambition and Avarice
30 Heroic Verses
31 Starmaiden

All music by Hiroto Saitoh、Studio MINSTREL / LILT RECORDS.
